amendment.description: To provide economic assistance to the oyster industry in Louisiana affected by Hurricanes Isidore and Lili.

vote.text: Amendment SA 191 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 191 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Breaux. (consideration: CR S1406-1408; text: CR S1407) To provide economic assistance to the oyster industry in Louisiana affected by Hurricanes Isidore and Lili.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 191 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 191 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Breaux.
